price: Ama wale ambao mizani zao zitakuwa nzito, hao ndio wenye kufanikiwa.
arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: A'mali (Vitendo) ndio mizani ya kupimia. Mwenye Imani nzuri na vitendo vyema atakuwa na uzito katika mizani ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Hao ndio walio fuzu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
